TriggerText.Text: The Noble House Kundarak offers to support your Empire!
The Noble House Tharashk offers to support your Empire!
The Noble House Cannith offers to support your Empire!
The Noble House Phiarlan offers to support your Empire!
The Guild of the Nine offers to support your Empire!
The Noble House Ghallanda offers to support your Empire!
The Noble House Vadalis offers to support your Empire!

Warning! The Support by a Noble Houses has fallen below 70. If we do not try to keep their Support high by aiding their agenda, one of our Cities might revolt. Their is still plenty of time left but we should make some plans soon how to keep their Support high. The Advisor Screen for the Noble Houses has more information on the current Support level of the Houses and the Civilopedia entries of the Noble Houses list ways to increase their Support.

Warning! The Support by a Noble Houses has fallen below 40. They might already plot a Revolution. The Advisor Screen for the Noble Houses has more information on the current Support level of the Houses and the Civilopedia entries of the Noble Houses list ways to increase their Support.
